vars.value: [root log: November 2025|WIth LLM bots banned], [IRON NODER XVIII: NEGLIGENCE IS THE RUST OF THE SOUL|Iron Noding is in season]. New chat and layout system is live, file a [https://github.com/everything2/everything2/issues|bug] if something looks weird. [root log: mid-November 2025 - Nodelet updates|Recent root log] has errata.

e2's home of free speech.
Causing Unusual Noder Tension since 2007.

Prudes exit now.
The Speakeasy is a room for the [e2Mafia] group to play [Mafia] without bothering the [go outside|main chat room].
Never look a gift leopard in the mouth.
JEEVES BRING ME MY BISQUE ALREADY
If you feel alone in here, and need to ask questions, try any of the people in [E2gods] or [Content Editors] - they have "@" or "$" signs in [Everything Finger] or [Other Users]
